participant_2.background:
I like the guitar.
I like music.
I like to skateboard.
I am a vegan.

content.text: I'm really into fantasy worlds, like Lord of the Rings and Harry Potter. Do you like any fantasy worlds?
I like Lord of the Rings, but I haven't read Harry Potter. I'm more into music. I like to play guitar and listen to music.
That's cool! I used to play guitar a lot, but I haven't in a while. I'm also into music, but I'm more into rock and metal.
Oh, nice! I like rock and metal too. I'm a vegan, so I don't eat meat or dairy. Do you have any dietary restrictions?
No, I don't have any dietary restrictions. I love to eat meat and dairy.
That's cool. I used to eat meat, but I switched to a vegan diet a few years ago.
Why did you decide to become a vegan?
I decided to become a vegan because I wanted to do something to help the environment. I also believe that it's wrong to eat animals.
That's a good reason. I'm glad you're doing something to help the environment.
Thanks! I'm glad I could talk to you about it.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
